__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: §l§l야생동물

pages.text: TerraFirmaCraft의 세상은 동물들로 가득합니다. 몇몇 동물들은 도움이 되지만, 다른 동물들은 매우 위험합니다. 이 단락은 야생동물에 관한 것입니다. 당신에게 도움을 줄 수 있는 생물과 동물들에 대해서는 $(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry)축산업$() 페이지를 확인하세요.
동물들은 $(l:the_world/wild_animals#predators)포식자$(), $(l:the_world/wild_animals#prey)피식자$(), 그리고 $(l:the_world/wild_animals#aquatic)수생 동물$()들로 분류될 수 있습니다.$(br2)다음 페이지에서는 각각의 동물 분류에 대해서 설명합니다.

$(thing)포식자$()는 플레이어를 공격할 수 있는 동물입니다. 그들은 밤에만 사냥하는 $(thing)야행성$()이거나, 낮에만 사냥하는 $(thing)주행성$()입니다. 포식자들은 최근에 먹잇감을 사냥했는지에 따라 중립적이거나 공격적입니다. 포식자들은 방어하는 자신의 영역이 있으므로 충분히 멀리 도망친다면 그들은 당신을 쫓는 대신 자신의 영역으로 돌아갈 것입니다.
pages.title: §l포식자

pages.name: Polar Bear
pages.text: The polar bear spawns in only the coldest regions, $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() at most 10°C, with a $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 100mm.

pages.name: Grizzly Bear
pages.text: The grizzly bear spawns in forests of moderate climates, with a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() range of -15 to 15°C and at least 200mm of $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$().

pages.name: Black Bear
pages.text: The black bear spawns in forests of warmer, wetter climates, of $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() 5 to 20°C and at least 250mm of $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$().

pages.name: Cougar
pages.text: The cougar prefers most moderate climates, with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() from -10 to 21°C and at least 150mm of $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$().

pages.name: Panther
pages.text: The panther prefers most moderate climates, with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() from -10 to 21°C and at least 150mm of $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$().

pages.name: Lion
pages.text: The lion spawns in plains with an average $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 16°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 50 and 300mm.

pages.name: Sabertooth
pages.text: The sabertooth spawns at any $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() above 0°C, and any $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() above 250mm.

The wolf spawns at any $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() below 22°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 150 and 420mm. They hunt in packs. Feeding a wolf enough times will tame it into a $(l:mechanics/pets)Dog$().

Although the ocelot does not attack players, it can attack small animals. It spawns at any $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() above 15 and below 30°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 300 and 500mm, in forests. Feeding an ocelot enough times will tame it into a $(l:mechanics/pets)Cat$().
$(thing)피식자$() 동물들은 플레이어와 포식자 동물들을 두려워합니다. 그들은 위험을 잘 피하지만, 반격하지는 못합니다. 일부 피식자 동물들은 농작물 먹기를 좋아합니다.
pages.title: §l피식자

pages.name: Boar
pages.text: The boar spawns in plains with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() below 25°C and above -5°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 130 and 400mm.

pages.name: Rabbit
pages.text: The rabbit is known to chew on carrots and cabbage. They are ubiquitous in the world, changing their coat based on climate. They only need 15mm of $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() to spawn.

pages.name: Fox
pages.text: The fox likes to eat the berries off of bushes. It can be found in forests with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() below 25°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 130 and 400mm.
The deer spawns at any $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() below 25°C and above -15°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 130 and 400mm.
The moose spawns at any $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() below 10°C and above -15°C, and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() between 150 and 300mm.
$(thing)수생 동물$()들은 여러 다른 종류를 포함하는 넓은 분류입니다. 수생 동물에는 $(thing)해안 생물$(), $(thing)물고기$(), $(thing)갑각류$(), 또는 $(thing)거대 해양 생물$() 등이 있습니다.
pages.title: §l수생 동물

pages.text: $(thing)해안 생물$()은 해안에만 생성되며 낮에는 잠시 물에서 지내고, 다시 해안으로 돌아오기도 합니다. 해안 생물들은 호기심이 많아서 플레이어를 따라다니지만, 길들일 수는 없습니다.

pages.name: Penguin
pages.text: The penguin spawns in only the coldest beaches, with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at most -14°C and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 75mm.

pages.name: Sea Turtle
pages.text: The sea turtle likes warm water. It spawns in $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 21°C and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 250mm.
$(thing)물고기$()는 물에서 헤엄치는 작은 생물입니다. 대부분은 $(l:mechanics/fishing)낚시$()할 수 있습니다. 각각 바다, 강, 호수를 사는 종류가 있습니다.
pages.title: §l물고기

pages.name: Cod
pages.text: Cod prefer colder oceans, $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() at most 18°C. They can be fished.

pages.name: Pufferfish
pages.text: Pufferfish live in any ocean with at least a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of 10°C.

pages.name: Jellyfish
pages.text: Jellyfish live in warmer oceans, with a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 18°C.

pages.name: Tropical Fish
pages.text: Tropical fish prefer warmer oceans, with a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 18°C.

pages.name: Salmon
pages.text: Salmon spawn in any river or lake with a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least -5°C.

pages.name: Bluegill
pages.text: Bluegill spawn in any river or lake with a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least -10°C and at most 26°C.
$(thing)갑각류$()는 물 속 바닥에 사는 동물들입니다. 낚시할 수는 없지만, 먹거나 $(l:mechanics/flux)플럭스$()를 만들 수 있는 껍데기를 떨어뜨립니다. 갑각류는 낚시용 $(l:mechanics/fishing)미끼$()가 될 수 있습니다.
pages.title: §l갑각류

pages.name: Isopod
pages.text: Isopods spawn in deeper sections of oceans of $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() at most 14°C.

pages.name: Lobster
pages.text: Lobster spawn in any ocean that is at most of a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of 21°C.

pages.name: Crayfish
pages.text: Crayfish are like lobster, but spawn in rivers and lakes. They need a $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 5°C and a $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 125mm.

pages.name: Horseshoe Crab
pages.text: Horseshoe crabs spawn in oceans of moderate climate, $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() between 10 and 21°C and with a $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at most 400mm.
$(thing)거대 해양 생물$()은 더 넓은 물에 사는 큰 동물입닏. 그 중 일부는 물고기를 먹기도 합니다. 이들은 등불의 연료로 쓰일 수 있는 $(l:mechanics/lamps#tallow)고래기름$()을 떨어뜨립니다.
pages.title: §l거대 해양 생물

pages.name: Orca
pages.text: Orca whales live in deep oceans with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at most 19°C and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 100mm.

pages.name: Dolphin
pages.text: Dolphins live in deep oceans with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 10°C and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at least 200mm.

pages.name: Manatee
pages.text: Manatees live in any warm lake, with $(l:the_world/climate#temperature)temperature$() of at least 20°C and $(l:the_world/climate#rainfall)rainfall$() of at most 300mm.
오징어는 깊은 바다에 생성됩니다. 오징어는 $(thing)먹물 주머니$()를 떨어뜨리고 플레이어가 가까이 접근하면 먹물을 뿜습니다. 누군가는 깊고 험한 동굴에 사는 오징어는 특이한 특징을 가진다고 합니다.
pages.title: §l오징어
